bibl.title: Negative ⲛ- without ⲁⲛ as a Late Survival in Coptic Egyptian.
bibl.note: An earlier version of this paper was presented to the Ninth International Congress of Coptic Studies (Cairo, September 2008). - See in part. pp. 133-136: examples from the Kellis papyri (P. Kellis Copt. V).
bibl.seg: Wolf-Peter Funk, Negative ⲛ- without ⲁⲛ as a Late Survival in Coptic Egyptian.

An earlier version of this paper was presented to the Ninth International Congress of Coptic Studies (Cairo, September 2008). - See in part. pp. 133-136: examples from the Kellis papyri (P. Kellis Copt. V).
